src:
Breitbart Launches 'B Inspired News' on Instagram
The left believes in a different America.  That’s what they’re selling, and the only way to sell something different is to point out the flaws in what currently exists. That’s what the left does. It has to. It has to object to the fundamental character of America in order to justify its desire to change it.
06 Nov 2019, 17:59 by Breitbart News
At Breitbart News, we love America and believe in its exceptionalism. We believe in the American spirit.
To that end, we are proud to introduce a brand new Instagram page called B Inspired News that will showcase true stories that we feel represent the inherent goodness of Americans.
We hope you FOLLOW B INSPIRED NEWS now, because every day in America, somebody does something amazing.
